generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings, extending from the foreground into the distance, with vehicles and pedestrians around it.
- sidewalk: The sidewalk is visible on both sides of the road, with pedestrians walking on it and delineated by curbs and poles.
- building: Multiple buildings with commercial signs and windows are visible along the street, including shops and restaurants.
- vegetation: Trees with green foliage are present along the sidewalk and street, providing shade and greenery.
- person: Several pedestrians are visible walking on the sidewalk and crossing the street.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign indicating "P Bereich Steintor" is visible on the right side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible along the sidewalk, including those supporting the traffic sign and other street fixtures.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is parked on the sidewalk near the buildings.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the sidewalk near the buildings.
- car: Several cars are visible parked along the street and in the distance.
